title: My god, do some of you still not know how Yi works?
body:
I just spent a good 30 minutes coping abuse from my AD because she thought I should be engaging the team fights first as Yi.

The fuck is wrong with some people? Yi was one of the first champions ever made in this game, people should know he can't be the one to engage a team fight. On top of the abuse, she got the worst stats overall aside from the enemy support and STILL blamed me for us losing.

She complained about me not engaging when I was stuk in Jinx's CC, she complained when I didn't engage first and still got a double kill, she complained when I did engage first in a 3v2 fight and died due to being CC'd twice.

Correct me if I am blatantly wrong, does a Yi engage the team fight first? Or is his job to go in after it has started and clean up the mess?

Is it just that some assholes love finding fault in others to blame when they are that bad they can't do anything themselves? I don't get it. I really don't. Why is it that the clearly worst player on the map is always complaining about someone? Why do they always pick one particular person, mostly the jungler and never looks at their own game as to why they are losing?

replies.body: Yi is an assassin style champ who can run down an isolated champ and blow them up before they know what hit them .. he can be very strong in team fights if he times his q correctly to doge cc however I would say he shouldn't really be straight up engaging on the entire team .. because he will get cced into oblivion, let the big front line tanks do that and soak up the damage and spells before he goes in. I think people rage at you because they are not doing well, so they try and blame it on others, also they might not be very good, or used to playing another video game.. they don't realize it might be their own fault they are not doing well ... or just to afraid to admit it. best thing to do is just report them for negative attitude or mute them early.
Yi is a noob champion where you just save CC for and burst him while he is stunned and of cancer done.

I'd prefer to keep the communications open, like in the event of that game our Ashe never pinged, not even once, she only talked in chat and even though she sucked ass and we lost, she at least tried to talk in chat. With mute on I would have gotten nothing out of her and probably reported for failing to communicate.

Fair enough, I feel the same, I hardly ever mute players eve when I know I should, its just a shame there are people out there who have to toxic dump the chat, I guess just a report after the game is the best you can do.
Assassins shouldn't be the one to start the teamfight because they will get CC and just die. Tanks should be the one to initiate the fight or if you have something like Annie with Aoe CC.
To be fair, your team comp was pretty trash and there wasn't any champ with a clear engage other than ashe, so it would have to be an all in for you, riven and your yas.

It is not just about who could engage, but what the best outcome was. If anyone else engaged first and soaked some CC I would have gone in and done more damage. As Ashe was asking me to engage, I soaked the CC and basically was useless.
Yi can engage, but I definitely prefer him to come in after the initial engage when the CC has gone, and wipe up/save those who are half dead.
yi can work as an engage though.
No one cares man - you play normals Kappa
